Html:
InteractionRequestTrigger doesn't implements WeakEvent pattern.
It seems the memory leak occurs when the ViewModel has longer life cycle than the View.

Hi,

If you find this behavior blocking, you could create a work item in the Issue Tracker. Additionally, it would be helpful if you could add a repro sample that confirms this behavior (it is possible to attach files in the issue tracker).

Thanks,
